meanings.definition: The act of stripping a currency unit of its status as legal tender.
meanings.sent1: The demonetization of the old coins caused confusion among the people.
meanings.sent2: The demonetization of the currency notes led to long lines at the banks.
meanings.sent3: During the demonetization, some people started using barter system for trade.
meanings.sent4: The demonetization was like erasing the value of the coins overnight.
meanings.sent5: The impact of demonetization on the economy was significant.

meanings.definition: The process of removing the monetary value from something.
meanings.sent1: The demonetization of the gift card made it useless.
meanings.sent2: The demonetization of the coupon reduced its worth to zero.
meanings.sent3: The demonetization of the arcade tokens left the players disappointed.
meanings.sent4: The demonetization of the virtual currency felt like losing all your savings.
meanings.sent5: The demonetization of the loyalty points devalued the rewards.
